rules_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
[i]“So it's decided: I'm going to succeed Dietrich as seer. I'm happy, and nervous, and even a little sad. Bruhild and I are going different ways, it seems.”
—Kriemhild's journal[/i]
